posts.body: "In order to have what most people want, you have to do what most people won't."
posts.author: Osama

posts.body: "If it were easy, everyone would do it."
posts.author: Osama

posts.body: "هي النفسُ ما حمّلتها تتحمّلُ .. وللدهرِ أيامٌ تجورُ وتعدلُ"
posts.author: Osama

posts.body: This course is hopefully very helpful to you!
posts.author: Maximilian
